name: Blink Galaxy
description: Blink Galaxy Blockchain (Blinkchain) is a gas-free Web3 gaming stack by SOREDI GAMES unifying Outer Ring MMO (Alpha), Racerloop, and the Blink Galaxy hub under $BG. Gameplay runs on SKALE (instant finality), while $BG launches on Base for liquidity. Blink Passport (email + password) enables Web2-simple onboarding and an identity layer so items/rewards travel across games. $BG powers governance, rewards, fees/discounts, and cross-title incentives. Milestones: SKALE mainnet (Jan 1, 2026). Fixed supply: 10B; With live IP, esports co-marketing, marketplace/crafting fees, and partner SDKs, Blinkchain turns mainstream gamers into on-chain participants and gives studios fee-less rails to build and scale.
